lines.text: The dogs approve of you. They only approve of murderers and perverts. Which one are you?
What a lovely party, countess. One hopes you are not over-extending yourself.
I don't like to be left behind. I have no talent for it.
There are no more real men. Facsimiles, that's all. Facsimiles!
There's nothing like a piece of pre-breakfast chocolate cake!
You'll sleep with anyone, won't you?
Well....yes... but I do have my preferences!
